title: How To Get a Plex Server Docker Container on Synology Quickly!
description:
Sign up for a Plexpass: http://lon.tv/plexpass - Thanks to Synology's new DSM 7.2's Container Manager app it's now super easy to get a Plex server running in a Docker container. I'll show you to set it up in this quick tutorial. See more Plex: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIvqJPAmMooCKOHieLdi3I7o and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s

Links:
Hardware Transcoding Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2PyRpYb66-Y
Time Zone Database: https://lon.tv/tzdatabase
Linuxserver Plex Container Website: https://lon.tv/plexdocker

My Docker Compose text file: https://lon.tv/plex-docker-compose.txt

VIDEO INDEX:
00:00 - Intro
01:38 - Why Use a Container?
02:19 - Prereqs
03:19 - Hardware Transcoding Note
04:29 - Install Process
05:46 - Creating Docker-Compose File
11:19 - Building The Container
13:33 - Adding Server to Plex Account
14:04 - Server Setup
15:17 - Hardware Transcoding Configuration & Demo
17:49 - Updating
19:51 - Local Files Structure
21:06 - Conclusion
